items.Justification: While this paper discusses improving channel reciprocity, it is focused on Reconfigurable Intelligent Surfaces (RIS) for physical layer key generation, which is not directly related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This paper is a survey on using Graph Neural Networks for EEG-based emotion recognition, which is not related to FSOC or the specific topics of interest.
This paper focuses on distributed deep learning for modulation classification in future wireless networks (6G), which is not directly related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
This is a systematic review of machine learning algorithms for seizure detection in EEG, which has no relevance to FSOC or the mentioned interests.
While this paper involves machine learning and EEG, it is focused on neonatal seizure detection using a reduced montage, which is not related to FSOC or adaptive optics.
